templateOptions.label: Base URL
templateOptions.description: The URL to the API of your HelloID tenant

templateOptions.label: Api key
templateOptions.description: The API key of your HelloID tenant

templateOptions.label: Set manager
templateOptions.description: Please note. As we use the AccountReference of the manager for this, HelloID has to have granted the Account entitlement for the manager first.
